Resources
#########

As I began ROMhacking and developing this tool I of course became aware of communtiies and pre-existing documentation that I will store in these docs too as they are public domain articles. I will also link websites that have more information on this sort of thing and relevant communities in which you may ask more questions.

+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|`Local IPS <https://github.com/BrettefromNesUniverse/patchlib/blob/main/docs/resources/__%20ZeroSoft%20__.html>`_ | `Source IPS <https://zerosoft.zophar.net/ips.php>`_                                |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|`Local BPS <https://github.com/BrettefromNesUniverse/patchlib/blob/main/docs/resources/bps_spec.html>`_           | `Source BPS <https://github.com/blakesmith/rombp/blob/master/docs/bps_spec.md>`_   |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
